command.description: The shell command of the job.

exec.description: If activated and if the crontab was modified, then command will be executed just after the crontab modification.

match.description:
The cron entry to match, a string will be converted to a regexp and an
undefined or null value will match the exact command.

user.description: The user of the crontab. The SSH user by default.

when.description: Cron-styled time string. Defines the frequency of the cron job.
